p: We collected the laboratory-confirmed human cases of avian influenza A (H7N9) virus infection during 2013â€“2017 from the Chinese National Influenza Centre ( http://www.chinaivdc.cn/cnic/zyzx/lgzb/) and the Centre for Health Protection of Hong Kong ( https://www.chp.gov.hk/en/index.html), which built an integrated dataset with detailed demographic, epidemiology, and geographical information for every case. We extracted information about the location and date of illness confirmation.
